topic.title: Generic sub-topic
topic.shortdesc: This is a generic topic that is designed to test sub-topics in a variety of locations. It should always be referenced from a topicref element; specialized elements in this test get their OWN, very special topics.

fig.title: Test figure in generic topic
fig.p: This figure appears in a heavily reused topic, so that the figure list should contain many copies.

body.p: Let's talk about something fun.
